nodes.bodyText: Sure, no argument from me. I hope someone else makes that decision. I mainly opened this PR to trigger this type of discussion, and so that we don’t forget to update these.
Not sure where this is used but why point out "Fusion" at all?
Same here, why use "Fusion endpoints" instead of "endpoints"?
Remove this use of "REQUIRE_HOME_NODE_EXECUTABLE"; it is deprecated.
